name: Wattson's Way Home
description:
Wattson’s Way Home is a 2D platformer game about helping a little spark find his way home. One day during a thunderstorm, Wattson fell out of a lightning bolt and was sent crashing into an unsuspecting house. Lost in a strange place filled with dust bunnies and leaky pipes, Wattson only knows that he needs to make it back home. Help find Wattson’s Way Home!
